title: Minecraft 携带版 Alpha 0.12.1 Build 13 已发布
author: hellodrf
txt_content:
本帖最后由 hellodrf 于 2015-9-2 19:30 编辑 

TweaksImproved water climbing against a wallImproved pathfinding of mobs inside fencesCorrected some sounds volumeBetter ordering on chunk scheduling, less holes!

Bug FixesFixed a crash when a client joins a suspended serverFixed released button not going back to the unpressed stateFixed placing flower pots on upside-down slabs and stairsFixed creating an old world glitching the edit menuFixed sounds not playing when player jumps on snowFixed nether portal not loading properly for clientsFixed some rendering of items in third-person mode and other player handsAdded missing sounds for zombie footsteps and ghast deathFixed fishing not working properly in multiplayer.Fixed bobber not disappearing on lava

修正
在靠墙的水中向上爬已被优化
优化的围栏内怪物路径找寻
修正了一些音效音量
方块更好的排序调度，更少的洞！（？）


修复bug
修复了加入暂停的服务器时会崩溃
修复了按下的按钮不会恢复原来的状态
修复了可以放置花盆在纵向的阶梯和半砖上
修复了创建旧型世界编辑菜单会撕裂
修复了玩家踩在雪上的音效
修复了多人游戏中地狱传送门的不正常加载
修复了多人游戏第三人称视角一些物件的渲染
添加了僵尸的脚步声和恶魂死亡时的音效
修复了多人游戏中钓鱼动作的不正常
修复了钓鱼竿浮子不会在岩浆中消失


【支持正版，拒绝盗版！】
百度云：http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=70617423&uk=525011901
